Notes Work About

Hey Hey Hey,

I am currently a web developer at Bay Photo Lab.

I use Assemble to statically generate my website and Middleman for everything else. I make boilerplates for everything because I hate wasting time setting up new projects. I don't think the word "pretty" should be used to describe design.

I'm currently excited about object oriented programming, JavaScript, Middleman, Sass, Ruby, Rails, Grunt, static site generators.

I really wish I had more time to write about stuff.
